heading: University High School of Science and Engineering
subheading: Early college high school located on the campus of University of Hartford
bulletin:
**Welcome!** We seek to bring out the best in each of our students by focusing on high academic achievement.

Make sure to check out the links below: 

* [UHSSE Times](https://uhssetimes.com/)
* [Virtual Tour](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TcA_zS9w9YM)
* [Calculator Loan Agreement](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1WyPIX1hagciX6RaD1XRfOmfTpyu27ZZT/view?usp=sharing)
* [Graduate Transcript Request Form](https://drive.google.com/open?id=1f0I7PmRUWCzzeJ60YdwFLx-GfH2omWO6)
* [Volunteer Application](https://apps.raptortech.com/Apply/NTI1ODplbi1VUw==)

showcase.heading: Unparalleled Education
showcase.subheading: Students are presented with a wide variety of high level courses throughout their four years.

showcase.heading: College Collaboration
showcase.subheading: A partnership with UHart allows our students to get a full taste of the college world.

showcase.heading: Extracurricular Excellence
showcase.subheading: From popcorn club to robotics to track and field, there is something for everyone!
